headline: US Debt Limit Hit
description: Treasury begins extraordinary measures as US hits $31.4T debt ceiling, sparking political standoff.

headline: Fed Hikes by 25bps
description: Fed slows pace to 25bps hike; Powell signals 'disinflationary process' has started.

headline: Blowout Jobs Report
description: US adds 517k jobs, crushing estimates and raising fears of sticky inflation.

headline: CPI Prints Hot
description: January CPI rises 6.4%, signaling inflation is stickier than Fed hoped.

headline: Silvergate Bank Liquidates
description: Crypto-focused bank announces voluntary liquidation, first domino of the banking crisis.

headline: Silicon Valley Bank Collapses
description: FDIC seizes SVB after massive bank run; 2nd largest bank failure in US history.

headline: Signature Bank Fails
description: Regulators close Signature Bank; Fed announces BTFP liquidity facility to stem contagion.

headline: Credit Suisse Panic
description: Credit Suisse shares plunge 24% as top shareholder rules out more funding.

headline: UBS Buys Credit Suisse
description: UBS acquires Credit Suisse for $3.2B in emergency rescue brokered by Swiss govt.

headline: Fed Hikes Despite Crisis
description: Fed raises rates 25bps to 4.75-5.00% despite banking turmoil, prioritizing inflation fight.

headline: Retail Sales Drop
description: US retail sales fall 1.0% in March, signaling consumer fatigue.

headline: First Republic Seized
description: JPMorgan acquires First Republic Bank after FDIC seizure; 3rd major failure of 2023.

headline: Fed Hikes to 16-Year High
description: Fed raises rates to 5.00-5.25%, hints at potential pause in hiking cycle.

headline: Nvidia AI Guidance Shock
description: Nvidia forecasts massive revenue jump due to AI chip demand, sparking global AI rally.

headline: Debt Ceiling Bill Signed
description: Biden signs bill suspending debt ceiling until 2025, averting default.

headline: Fed Pauses Hikes
description: Fed holds rates steady after 10 consecutive hikes but forecasts 2 more in 2023.

headline: Fed Hikes to 5.50%
description: Fed resumes tightening, pushing rates to highest level since 2001.

headline: Fitch Downgrades US
description: Fitch cuts US credit rating from AAA to AA+, citing fiscal deterioration.

headline: Powell Jackson Hole
description: Powell warns inflation still 'too high,' prepared to raise rates further if needed.

headline: CPI Accelerates
description: August CPI rises to 3.7% driven by oil prices, complicating Fed outlook.

headline: Fed Holds 'Hawkishly'
description: Fed holds rates but dot plot shows 'higher for longer' stance into 2024.

headline: Israel-Hamas War Begins
description: Hamas attacks Israel; oil prices spike as conflict raises geopolitical risks.

headline: 10Y Yield Hits 5%
description: US 10-Year Treasury yield touches 5.0% for first time since 2007.

headline: Fed Holds Steady
description: Fed leaves rates unchanged; markets interpret tone as end of hiking cycle.

headline: CPI Cools to 3.2%
description: Inflation slows more than expected, fueling bets on 2024 rate cuts.

headline: The Fed Pivot
description: Powell signals rate hikes are likely over; projects 3 cuts in 2024. Dow hits record.

headline: Jobs Data Strong
description: ADP report shows labor market resilience, tempering early rate cut bets.

headline: US Strikes Houthis
description: US/UK launch airstrikes in Yemen to protect Red Sea shipping; oil jumps.

headline: Fed Pushes Back
description: Powell says March rate cut is 'unlikely,' resetting market expectations.

headline: CPI Hotter than Expected
description: Jan CPI rises 3.1%, disappointing markets hoping for faster disinflation.

headline: Fed Dots Confirm Cuts
description: Fed maintains projection for 3 cuts in 2024 despite sticky inflation data.

headline: CPI Spooks Markets
description: March CPI accelerates to 3.5%, causing markets to price out June cut.

headline: Iran Attacks Israel
description: Iran launches drone/missile attack on Israel; fears of regional war escalate.

headline: Fed Tapers QT
description: Fed slows pace of balance sheet runoff (QT) to support liquidity.

headline: Jobs Blowout
description: Non-farm payrolls surge 272k, wages rise; yields jump as cuts delayed.

headline: Fed Dots Hawkish
description: Fed updates projections to show only 1 rate cut in 2024.

headline: CPI Finally Cools
description: June CPI falls 0.1% m/m, first negative print in years; cut bets return.

headline: BoJ Hikes Rates
description: Bank of Japan raises rates to 0.25%, surprising markets and boosting Yen.

headline: US Jobs Miss
description: Unemployment rises to 4.3%, triggering 'Sahm Rule' recession indicator.

headline: Yen Carry Trade Crash
description: Global markets plunge (Nikkei -12%) as Yen surge unwinds massive leverage.

headline: Powell: Time Has Come
description: Powell at Jackson Hole confirms 'time has come' for policy adjustment.

headline: Fed Cuts 50bps
description: Fed starts easing cycle with aggressive 50bps cut to 4.75-5.00%.

headline: Jobs Surprise Upside
description: Sept payrolls add 254k, alleviating recession fears.

headline: US Election Day
description: Americans vote in tight presidential race; markets volatile overnight.

headline: Trump Wins Election
description: Trump declared winner; 'Trump Trade' (Stocks up, Bonds down) ignites.

headline: Fed Cuts 25bps
description: Fed lowers rates to 4.50-4.75% amidst post-election market repricing.

headline: CPI Sticky at 2.6%
description: Inflation remains above target, limiting Fed's room to ease aggressively.

headline: Fed Cuts 25bps
description: Fed delivers 3rd cut of year to 4.25-4.50%, signaling 'soft landing' focus.

headline: Yields Spike on Deficit
description: 10Y Treasury hits 4.8% as bond vigilantes eye rising deficits under new admin.

headline: Trump Inauguration
description: President Trump sworn in; signs orders on deregulation and energy production.

headline: The DeepSeek Shock
description: Nasdaq plunges 3% as Chinese AI model 'DeepSeek' undermines US chip dominance.

headline: Nvidia Drops 17%
description: AI bellwether Nvidia crashes on fears of margin compression from cheap AI models.

headline: CPI Heats Up
description: January CPI rises to 2.9% on energy costs, putting Fed on pause alert.

headline: Fed Holds Rates
description: Fed pauses cuts at 4.25-4.50% citing 'stalled disinflation'.

headline: Liberation Day Tariffs
description: Trump announces 10% universal tariff and 50% on select nations; markets dive.

headline: Global Trade Shock
description: S&P 500 falls 4% as partners threaten retaliation; shipping stocks surge.

headline: GDP Slows
description: Q1 GDP growth slows to 1.1% as business investment pauses on trade fear.

headline: Retail Sales Slump
description: Consumer spending contracts 0.5% as import prices rise.

headline: Fed Holds Again
description: Fed keeps rates steady; dot plot shows disagreement on next move.

headline: Oil Hits $90
description: Crude oil rallies on Middle East tensions and new sanctions enforcement.

headline: Unemployment Hits 4.5%
description: Labor market cracks under tariff pressure; hiring freezes widespread.

headline: MIT AI Report
description: Report questioning AI ROI causes second tech selloff; 'AI Winter' fears grow.

headline: Payroll Shock
description: US loses 20k jobs in August; recession narrative takes hold.

headline: Fed Panic Cut
description: Fed cuts rates by 50bps to 3.75-4.00% to save labor market.

headline: CPI Falls to 2.1%
description: Demand destruction drives inflation down near target.

headline: Fed Cuts 25bps
description: Fed lowers rates to 3.50-3.75%; promises 'whatever it takes' for growth.

headline: Burry Shorts AI
description: Filings reveal Michael Burry has massive short on AI software; tech lags.

headline: Govt Shutdown Looms
description: Budget talks stall over tariff revenue projections; volatility spikes.

headline: Jobs Stabilize
description: November payrolls flat (0k); markets relieved it wasn't worse.

headline: Fed Cuts 25bps
description: Fed cuts to 3.25-3.50%, marking 100bps of easing in 4 months.

headline: Santa Rally Returns
description: Stocks rally into year-end on hopes of trade deal and easier money.

headline: Trade Talks Open
description: US and China agree to preliminary talks to reduce tariffs; markets surge.

headline: Earnings Beat
description: Major banks report solid earnings, suggesting economy is bending not breaking.

headline: Fed Pauses Cuts
description: Fed holds at 3.25-3.50% to assess impact of rapid easing.

headline: Jobs Rebound
description: January payrolls add 110k, signaling potential soft landing achieved.

headline: Tech Recovery
description: Nasdaq recovers 50% of 'DeepSeek' losses as US firms adapt to new models.

headline: Current Day
description: Markets await tomorrow's CPI print; VIX stable at 18.
